revised_title: Dynamic Aspects of Light Scattering by Gases: Rotational Raman and Depolarized Rayleigh Spectra
tldr: This article investigates the dynamic aspects of light scattering by gases, focusing on the rotational Raman and depolarized Rayleigh spectra. The authors conducted experiments with hydrogen isotopes to study the effects of molecular collisions on spectral line shapes, providing insights into intermolecular collision processes and gas dynamics.
